segments.text: Yes . Do you exchange foreign money here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Our bank is authorized to deal with foreign exchange .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kinds of currency do you change ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can change only three kinds of currency , USD , Japanese Yen and HK Dollar in our savings office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me what the exchange rate for USD is today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The buying rate is 826 . 44 yuan for 100 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to change some Us dollars to cover my expense here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please go to Counter No . 2 , the foreign exchange counter . It's over there .
segments.speaker: S1
